actions.name: War Pick
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 6 (1d8+2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Crystalline Dart
actions.desc: _Ranged Weapon Attack:_ +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 7 (2d4+2) piercing damage.

special_abilities.name: Gnome Cunning
special_abilities.desc: The deep gnome has advantage on INT, WIS, and CHA saves against magic.

special_abilities.name: Stone Camouflage
special_abilities.desc: The deep gnome's Stealth is 17 while in rocky terrain.
